ARABIC: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Truly We sent it down on the Night of Power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: TRULY WE REVEALED it on the Night of Determination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Behold, We revealed this (Qur'an) on the Night of Power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We revealed the Quran on the Night of Destiny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We have indeed sent down the Qur’an in the Night of Destiny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We have sent it down in the Night of Al-Qadr.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We revealed it on the grand night.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Behold, We sent it down on the Night of Power;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We revealed it on the Night of Predestination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We sent it [Quran] down on the Night of Destiny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! We have sent it down on the night of Power.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed We sent it down on the Night of Ordainment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We have indeed revealed this (Message) in the Night of Power:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! We have sent it (this Quran) down in the night of Al-Qadr (Decree)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We sent this (the Holy Koran) down on the Night of Honor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We sent it down on the Night of Decree.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [97:1]   Lo! We revealed it, that is, the Qur’ān, in its entirety, [sending it down] from the Preserved Tablet to the heaven of this world, on the Night of Ordainment, that is, [the Night] of great eminence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said regarding the interpretation of Allah's saying (Lo! We revealed it): '(Lo! We revealed it) He says: We sent Gabriel with the entire Qur'an to the scribes of the nether heaven (on the Night of Power) on the night of judgement and decree; it is also said this means: on a night blessed with forgiveness and mercy, and then it was revealed to the Prophet (pbuh) in instalments.
